name: Cold Comfort (itch)
description:
It's Winter, and all the little critters have caught colds! Help the Hot Water Bottle Fairy end the epidemic!

This was my first and, by extension, ridiculously simplistic and occasionally buggy game. Made using the free version of Construct 3 and a love of hot water bottles. There aren't enough games about hot water bottles...

All constructive feedback is welcome. :)

CONTROLS: Mouse: Left click to fire, hold left mouse button to rotate. Touch: Tap to fire, hold to rotate.
